body_html:
I have also tried using the command line "tflite_convert" interface and get the same behaviour.
When I include the "--allow_custom_ops" flag, it does produce a non-empty .tflite, however it does not tell me which ops I should be customizing, and when I try to load this file in my Android app I get the following error:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Contents of /file:/android_asset/SEGNET.tflite does not encode a valid TensorFlowLite model: Could not open '/file:/android_asset/SEGNET.tflite'.The model is not a valid Flatbuffer file
  at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.createModel(Native Method)
  at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.<init>(NativeInterpreterWrapper.java:41)
  at org.tensorflow.lite.Interpreter.<init>(Interpreter.java:135)
  at org.tensorflow.lite.Interpreter.<init>(Interpreter.java:112)
  at org.qus.segmentLite.TensorFlowQUSRunnerSegmentLite.create(TensorFlowQUSRunnerSegmentLite.java:117)
body_text:
I have also tried using the command line "tflite_convert" interface and get the same behaviour.
When I include the "--allow_custom_ops" flag, it does produce a non-empty .tflite, however it does not tell me which ops I should be customizing, and when I try to load this file in my Android app I get the following error:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Contents of /file:/android_asset/SEGNET.tflite does not encode a valid TensorFlowLite model: Could not open '/file:/android_asset/SEGNET.tflite'.The model is not a valid Flatbuffer file

body:
I have also tried using the command line "tflite_convert" interface and get the same behaviour. 
When I include the "--allow_custom_ops" flag, it does produce a non-empty .tflite, however it does not tell me which ops I should be customizing, and when I try to load this file in my Android app I get the following error:
```
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Contents of /file:/android_asset/SEGNET.tflite does not encode a valid TensorFlowLite model: Could not open '/file:/android_asset/SEGNET.tflite'.The model is not a valid Flatbuffer file
  at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.createModel(Native Method)
  at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.<init>(NativeInterpreterWrapper.java:41)
  at org.tensorflow.lite.Interpreter.<init>(Interpreter.java:135)
  at org.tensorflow.lite.Interpreter.<init>(Interpreter.java:112)
  at org.qus.segmentLite.TensorFlowQUSRunnerSegmentLite.create(TensorFlowQUSRunnerSegmentLite.java:117)
```
